hints.content:
$\pink4\blue9$ is $\pink4$ tens and $\blue9$ ones.

$\pink2\blue9$ is $\pink2$ tens and $\blue9$ ones.

$\pink4$ tens is more than $\pink2$ tens.

$49$ is more than $29$.

Allison has more books than Kris.

choices.content: Allison and Kris have the same number of books.

question.content:
Allison has $49$ books.   
Kris has $29$ books.

**Who has more books?**
